channel.title: Testimony on Learning violin with Mr. Robert Lau
channel.description: Recent content in Testimony on Learning violin with Mr. Robert Lau

item.title: Dr. S.Z.
item.description: I have learned violin from Mr. Lau since I was 16. Although I stopped practicing for years, I decided to pick it up again. I am 60 year-old now. It is never to late to start!

item.title: Michelle W.
item.description: He is definitely a fantastic teacher!ï¼©have had lots of violin teachers, and his teaching techniques and strategies have helped me improve the fastest. He makes learning violin enjoyable and wants to see you improve. Highly recommend.
